SEARCH
Package com.cg.training.service

Class AppointmentSystemTest

java.lang.Object
com.cg.training.service.AppointmentSystemTest
public class AppointmentSystemTest extends Object
This class contains unit tests for the AppointmentSystem class. It tests functionalities like registering doctors and patients, booking and completing appointments, and handling exceptions.

This is written in simple Java for beginners to understand.

Author:
Rittika Dutta
